author: potuz
content: FWIW, this is the branch I am working to update ePBS' PR https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/compare/dev...potuz:consensus-specs:eip7732-patch1, it doesn't have anything on forkchoice yet, and I am thinking on adding the reward part of the index in the attestation being used as a payload and opening that as a PR on top of Electra if no one complains. I think this would be the minimal change needed to unlock further experimentation with implementation level, since forkchoice is contained and kinda irrelevant of what's the base. After merging something like this I'll work on rebasing on top of Fulu before continuing
